text.name: ub_enableOverloading_long
text.text: If set to true, overloading bales early will be possible.

text.name: ub_enableUnloading_long
text.text: If set to true, unloading bales early will be possible.

text.name: ub_overloadingThreshold_long
text.text: Overloading early will only be possible if the first chamber is filled to at least this percentage.

text.name: ub_unloadingThreshold_long
text.text: Unloading early will only be possible if the bale has been filled to at least this percentage.
